features: Enhanced Clear Sound - Equipped with advanced sound drive unit with full range 2.0 channel enhanced stereo core, GS520 ANVIL offers you superior auditory feast.

Touch Controlled RGB Lighting - Not only the sound quality is solid, but also the lighting bar is attractive. 6 modes are choosable for different vibes by touch-control, switch off the light is also available.
More Than Fancy - Minimalism modern urban design with brushed material style, the seamless blend of dynamic stylish and upscale textural feel.
Easy-access Volume Control - Individual volume up and volume down buttons make adjusting the volume easy and accurate.

Plug & Play for Broad Compatibility - USB powered with 3.5mm audio and mic cables allows this rockstar to party on wide types of stages for PC, TV, and Laptop. Up to 31 in (80 cm) cable length between two speakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Speakers are loud enough to enjoy for gaming and watching movies. These speaker dont have a subwoofer. Bass is not that good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Sound Quality in a Compact Package!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased these speakers, and I am absolutely blown away by their performance. If you're in the market for speakers that deliver outstanding sound quality without taking up much space, look no further.The first thing that impressed me was the compact design. These speakers are sleek and unobtrusive, making them a great fit for any room. They blend seamlessly with my setup, and I hardly notice they're there until the music starts playing.Now, let's talk about the sound quality. These speakers produce crystal-clear audio with a remarkable depth of sound. Whether it's music, movies, or gaming, the audio is rich, detailed, and immersive. The bass is punchy, and the highs are crisp – it's a complete audio experience.The setup is a breeze. They connected effortlessly to my devices, and I appreciate the included remote control for convenient adjustments. Additionally, the Bluetooth connectivity is a handy feature for wireless streaming.Despite their compact size, these speakers can fill a room with sound. They're perfect for both personal use and entertaining guests. I've had friends and family comment on how great the audio quality is.The only downside is that they're a bit on the pricey side, but the quality and performance make them worth the investment.In conclusion, these speakers have exceeded my expectations. They offer exceptional sound quality in a compact package, making them a perfect addition to any audio setup. If you want a premium sound experience without the bulk of larger speakers, these are the ones to go for. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars SUPA CUTE but a lil wonky
reviews.reviewText: i absolutely adore the color and led lights of this speaker and the sound quality is really nice as well! my only complaint is that i had to mess with the wires for awhile to get the speakers to both work after i had plugged them into my monitor, which was pretty frustrating (make sure to plug in the audio jack fully or else you’ll have a terrible static noise behind your sound). i also have run into another problem with the speakers randomly turning on / making that speaker thump noise and led lights turn on while mymonitor and gaming console is turned off. i’m not sure why this happens but it’s usually every few hours which is weird, it gets annoying after the first few times and i’m unsure how to fix this as my speakers are plugged in completely snug and my monitor is turned off when it happens :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great design, very affordable and outstanding sound. It sounds great my portable monitor and loud enough for you to be fully immersed in to music if that's your thing. Absolutely would recommend especially for those who have monitor built-in speakers that aren't the best. These speakers right here amazing. I love the color light feature on the speakers as well. God bless

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Turned a bad situation around. Fantastic customer service.
reviews.reviewText: Shipping?: Very very fast, packaged well.Sound quality? = a smidge too low even at max settings for the speaker and pc when adjusted for me personally otherwise very smooth and decent for the price.For gaming? = led looks sick, the design looks as nice as the displayed picture, no BS. The color modes available are: regular rainbow led colors, regular rainbow led colors but less saturated, breathing led, red, green, blue. Very easy to change with a small tap.Value? = for budget or even non-budget gaming, very strong addition to set up for its price.BUToriginal title: Defective - 9/10/2021; TWO DAYS AFTER opened and started using beginning 9/7/2021All of the above is true, above expectation, and would receive a 5 star from me only if it maintained itself this way, which it didn't...Reason for low rating = the original title of this post... Used it for TWO days. Worked absolutely fine and was above expectation for what it's worth. Then 3rd day... the left speaker stopped working. On top of not working, there is a ticking sound that is non-stop and very noticeable even at a high volume.I've messaged them. I'll update this response and star rating depending on how their customer service goes.update 1 - 9/17/21: The customer support is fantastic. Quick, simple, and precise responses. As of right now, I'm getting mine replaced. I think I was just unfortunate to get a factory error one. I'll update the rating and response once I test the second one when it arrives.update 2 - 9/19/21: Literally arrived in less than 2 days. Received it today, everything works perfectly when simply plugged in right out of the box. I'll update again if something happens after 2 days again; otherwise, I hope this review helped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars If you don't care about playing them louder, they're good.
reviews.reviewText: These were bought to replace some other PC speakers my cat decided to destroy. They're not as robust as my old ones, so I didn't expect them to be a complete 1:1 replacement. That said...Pros: Love the compactness of them, they fit well on my already busy desk. They have a decent sound when playing certain types of music or video game dialogue. I love the RGB! They match my ROG keyboard and Redragon mouse perfectly. The volume was wonky at first, but once I figured it out, the controls work fine. The touch controls for the RGB is nice!Cons: The sound on a lot of music isn't great, which is the whole point to having speakers in the first place! There's a "fuzziness" to it that is hard to get past. At first I thought it was just when playing music above around 30 or so on windows. But after trying different music and volumes, it happens even at low settings depending on the songs.I realize these are not exactly high quality, expensive speakers. So my expectations were pretty minimal. It's just really disappointing that they aren't as great as many of the reviews seem to say. Maybe I just got a bad set?Overall, wouldn't buy again, but they aren't the worst speakers I've ever had. Others seem to have had a better time with them, so maybe I'm an outlier. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These speakers are great for the price point. No bass responce but they sound good enough.
Me atendeu e bem bonita, troca de cores e tmbm tem a função de deixar só uma cor e desligar o led tmbm top
chegou bem antes do previsto, muito bem embalado e funcionando perfeitamente. Testei todinho, a qualidade do som é muito boa, sai bem limpo, o volume é bem alto.
Bastante buenas en cuestión de sonido, y el RGB hace que tengan estilo

Decided to upgrade since I've had the same speakers for 10+ years. Found these since I also have a Redragon keyboard as well that I love.Lights work perfectly, and I love being able to tap the top to change the colors. Sound seems pretty good so far. They FEEL like cheap speakers, even compared to my old ones. But for the price, it's good quality and everything works as it should.
